attribute.name: Arena
attribute.description: The hero can choose to gain +2 attack or +2 defense. Can be visited once per hero

attribute.name: Buoy
attribute.description: Provides +1 morale for the next battle that the hero fights

attribute.name: Garden of Revelation
attribute.description: The structure grants a one-time bonus of +1 to the knowledge skill of visiting heroes

attribute.name: Faerie ring
attribute.description: Provides +1 luck for the next battle that the hero fights

attribute.name: Fountain of Fortune
attribute.description: Randomly changes the visiting hero's luck for the next battle that the hero fights. The effect can be positive, negative, or neutral

attribute.name: Fountain of Youth
attribute.description: Provides +1 morale for the next battle that the hero fights. Increases the hero's movement by one day, allowing them to move further along the adventure map

attribute.name: Idol of Fortune
attribute.description: Provides +1 luck on odd days of the week, +1 morale on even days, and both on the seventh day

attribute.name: Learning stone
attribute.description: Adds 1000 experience to visiting hero. Can be visited once per hero

attribute.name: Library of Enlightenment
attribute.description: Provides +2 to all four primary skills of visiting heroes that have reached level 10. Can be visited once per hero

attribute.name: Magic well
attribute.description: Restores the hero's spell points to the maximum amount

attribute.name: Marletto tower
attribute.description: The structure grants a one-time bonus of +1 to the defense skill of visiting heroes

attribute.name: Mercenary camp
attribute.description: The structure grants a one-time bonus of +1 to the attack skill of visiting heroes

attribute.name: Mermaid
attribute.description: Provides +1 luck for the next battle that the hero fights

attribute.name: Rally flag
attribute.description: Provides +1 luck and morale for the next battle that the hero fights. Increases the hero's movement by one day, allowing them to move further along the adventure map

attribute.name: Scholar
attribute.description: Provides +1 to the primary skill / learn a random secondary skill / learn a random spell of visiting heroes. After the first visit, he disappears

attribute.name: School of Magic
attribute.description: Provides +1 to the spellpower/knowledge skill of visiting heroes for the 1000 gold. Can be visited once per hero

attribute.name: School of War
attribute.description: Provides +1 to the attack/defense skill of visiting heroes for the 1000 gold. Can be visited once per hero

attribute.name: Shrine of Magic Incantation
attribute.description: As long as the hero has a spellbook, a shrine will teach them a level one spell

attribute.name: Shrine of Magic Gesture
attribute.description: As long as the hero has a spellbook, a shrine will teach them a level two spell

attribute.name: Shrine of Magic Thought
attribute.description: As long as the hero has a spellbook and Wisdom-skill, a shrine will teach them a level three spell

attribute.name: Star axis
attribute.description: The structure grants a one-time bonus of +1 to the spellpower skill of visiting heroes

attribute.name: Swan pond
attribute.description: Provides +2 luck for the next battle that the hero fights. The hero loses the rest of the movement

attribute.name: Temple
attribute.description: Provides to hero +2 morale on the seventh day of the week, and +1 morale on other days for the next battle

attribute.name: Tree of Knowledge
attribute.description: Structure provide an extra level for any hero that visits it, usually at a cost

attribute.name: Witch's hut
attribute.description: Hero can visit the hut to learn a random secondary skill

attribute.name: University
attribute.description: The hero can visit the university to learn each of the four random secondary skills for 2000 gold
